item.title: 📝 isene/HyperList (17 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: isene

📝 Repository: isene/HyperList

📄 Descrizione: A powerful Terminal User Interface (TUI) application for creating, editing, and managing HyperLists - a methodology for describing anything in a hierarchical, structured format.

item.title: 📝 wilburhimself/gem_guard (10 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: wilburhimself

📝 Repository: wilburhimself/gem_guard

📄 Descrizione: GemGuard is your one-stop solution for Ruby supply chain security. Detect vulnerabilities, identify typosquats, generate SBOMs, and secure your dependencies with enterprise-grade tooling designed for modern DevOps workflows.

⭐ Stelle: 10

🍴 Forks: 0

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby
